ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Urban Legends
ComicInfo.Summary:
Leonardo gets in over his head when he comes face-to-face with an old foe: King Komodo! Will he escape the encounter unscathed? Will Leatherhead come to his aid? And where are his brothers when he needs 'em?!
The entire TMNT Volume 3 run-all 23 issues-reprinted in full color for the first time!
Culminating in 3 brand-new issues to close out the series!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Frank Fosco (a) & Courtland Brugger (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Frank Fosco (a), Erik Larsen (a), Reuben Rude (c) & I.H.O.C. (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Fahriza Kamaputra (c) | 3 |
